text: Majid Farzin is an Iranian powerlifter and has a Guinness World Record in Powerlifting in 2017. At the 2012 Summer Paralympics he won gold medal at the -82.5 kg category, with 237 kg.http://www.london2012.com/paralympics/powerlifting/event/men-82.5kg/index.html == See also == * Powerlifting at the 2008 Summer Paralympics – Men's 75 kg == References == Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Iran Category:Paralympic powerlifters of Iran Category:Powerlifters at the 2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Living people Category:Iranian Azerbaijani sportspeople Category:Medalists at the 2012 Summer Paralympics Category:People from Ardabil Province Category:Medalists at the 2008 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Iran Category:Iranian powerlifters Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Paralympic medalists in powerlifting
title: Majid Farzin
